The data for this lab can be found in the `ppk` data frame in the `stat20data` package. Run `?ppk` at the console to learn more about the columns.

You can pull down these questions in RStudio by running the following command at the console:

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false

usethis::use_course("https://tinyurl.com/lab-5-peoples-park")
```
